text: The Mayor shall appoint an executive director, who shall be a full-time employee of the District, to implement and administer the orders of the Boards of Allied Health in accordance with this chapter and rules and regulations issued pursuant to this chapter.
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2(c) of Health Occupations Revision General Amendment Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-146, July 28, 2009, 56 DCR 6308).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-26, see notes following § 3-1201.01.

DC CODE § 3-1202.19

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: District of Columbia Boards and Commissions. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Establishment of Health Occupation Boards and Advisory Committees; Membership; Terms. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Boards of Allied Health executive director.
